comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: The 1893 Columbian Exposition is gone!  All that remains is the Palace of Fine Arts (we're on the roof), and this huge empty expanse which was filled with fine, temporary structures.

comment.author: 35310696@N04
comment._content: Thanks, roketpad, for all of the marvellous comments, tags, and notes!
